attributes.action: Stop Caravans Travelling on UK Roads During The Day
attributes.additional_details:
After sadly missing my friends wedding ceremony due to yet another huge delay on the A30 caused by an overturned caravan, it is clear that something needs to be done.

Therefore, in order to allow non-caravanists to be able to travel on the UK roads during the summer months without having to pack an overnight bag for the inevitable disruption caused by these plastic menaces, we propose that they may only be towed between the hours of 8pm and 8am each day from May to September.

This will not only benefit the sanity of millions, but aid the struggling UK tourism industry by making it quicker to drive to the coast then it is to fly to Spain.

Please act now before it's too late.
